name: Skull Island: Rise of Kong - Colossal Edition
summary: This edition includes 8 exclusive film grains featuring the ability to experience a red-tinted rage mode and the original look of the classic 1933 and 1970s era King Kong films, the Kong style pack with 8 different colors so you can choose-your-own Kong color, a boss-rush mode allowing you to defeat all the titans of Skull Island, and a behind-the-scenes exclusive pack including looks at in-game artwork and the all-original orchestral soundtrack.
